1110011000100101 0111111101001101 1 -> sum: 0110010101110011, cout: 1
0100010101110100 0100010101001011 0 -> sum: 1000101010111111, cout: 0
0100000010101011 0001010011000001 0 -> sum: 0101010101101100, cout: 0
1111010001111110 1101100010000001 1 -> sum: 1100110100000000, cout: 1
1101110011100000 0101101010111100 0 -> sum: 0011011110011100, cout: 1
0001001011001000 0000100010110001 1 -> sum: 0001101101111010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
